actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.
Mr. Leach moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3834.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: To amend the rural housing loan guarantee program under section 502(h) of the Housing Act of 1949 to provide loan guarantees for loans made to refinance existing mortgage loans guaranteed under such section.

summary.text: Homeowners Financing Protection Act - Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to permit sec. 502 refinancing loan guarantees for single family low-and moderate-income mortgages guaranteed under the sec. 502 rural housing loan program. Sets forth refinancing loan requirements.

titles.title: To amend the rural housing loan guarantee program under section 502(h) of the Housing Act of 1949 to provide loan guarantees for loans made to refinance existing mortgage loans guaranteed under such section.
